details:
verb
- to transmit thoughts or feelings
= example: to transmit thoughts or feelings
= synonyms: intercommunicate
- to transmit information
= example: to transmit information
= synonyms: pass
- to receive Communion, in the Catholic church
= synonyms: commune
- to administer Communion
- to be in verbal contact
- to join or connect
= example: to join or connect
- to transfer to another
= example: to transfer to another
= synonyms: pass
